newsitem.title: USA: Vail Resorts Q1 resort revenues rise.
newsitem.headline: Vail Resorts Q1 resort revenues rise.

text.p: Vail Resorts Inc said first quarter resort revenue rose 9.5 percent over last year to $35.1 million, while resort cash flow climbed 10.2 percent to $10.3 million.
Vail indicated that the results exclude five days of the "Christmas/Holiday" period, which ended January 5, while results for the prior-year quarter exclude one day.
Resort revenue is revenue from resort operations and excludes revenue from real estate sales. Resort cash flow is resort revenue less operating expenses related to resort operations, Vail said.
